profile_picture_is_managed_by_ldap_serve: Profilbilledet administreres af LDAP-serveren og kan ikke ændres her.
click_profile_picture_to_upload_custom: Klik på profilbilledet for at uploade et brugerdefineret billede fra dine filer.
image_should_be_in_format: Billedet skal være i PNG eller JPEG-format.
dont_have_access_to_your_passkey: Har du ikke adgang til din adgangsnøgle?
create_a_login_code_to_sign_in_without_a: Opret en loginkode, som brugeren kan bruge til at logge ind uden en adgangsnøgle én gang.
name: Navn
this_browser_does_not_support_passkeys: Denne browser understøtter ikke adgangsnøgler. Benyt venligst en alternativ login metode.
error_occurred_with_authenticator: Der opstod en fejl med godkendelsesenheden
authenticator_does_not_support_any_of_th: Godkenderen understøtter ikke nogen af de ønskede algoritmer
critical_error_occurred_contact_administ: En kritisk fejl opstod. Kontakt venligst din administrator.
client_wants_to_access_the_following_inf: {client} ønsker at få adgang til følgende oplysninger:
do_you_want_to_sign_in_to_client_with_yo: Vil du logge ind på {client} med din {appName}-konto?
view_the_groups_you_are_a_member_of: Se de grupper, du er medlem af
do_you_want_to_sign_out_of_pocketid_with: Vil du logge ud af {appName} med kontoen {username}?
authenticate_yourself_with_your_passkey_: Bekræft din identitet med din adgangsnøgle for at få adgang til administrationspanelet.
you_are_about_to_sign_in_to_the_initial_: Du er ved at logge ind på den oprindelige administrator-konto. Enhver med dette link kan få adgang, indtil en adgangsnøgle tilføjes. Opsæt en adgangsnøgle hurtigst muligt for at forhindre uautoriseret adgang.
if_you_do_not_have_access_to_your_passke: Hvis du ikke har adgang til din adgangsnøgle, kan du logge ind med en af følgende metoder.
use_your_passkey_instead: Vil du i stedet bruge din adgangsnøgle?
enter_a_login_code_to_sign_in: Indtast en loginkode for at logge ind.
request_a_login_code_via_email: Anmod om en loginkode via e-mail.
an_email_has_been_sent_to_the_provided_e: En e-mail er blevet sendt til den angivne e-mailadresse, hvis den findes i systemet.
enter_your_email_address_to_receive_an_e: Indtast din e-mailadresse for at modtage en login-kode.
enter_the_code_you_received_to_sign_in: Indtast den kode, du har modtaget, for at logge ind.
see_your_account_activities_from_the_las: Se dine kontoaktiviteter fra de sidste 3 måneder.
profile_picture_updated_successfully: Profilbillede opdateret. Det kan tage et par minutter før ændringen vises.
please_provide_a_passkey_to_prevent_losi: Tilføj en adgangsnøgle for at undgå at miste adgangen til din konto.
it_is_recommended_to_add_more_than_one_p: Det anbefales at tilføje mere end én adgangsnøgle for at undgå at miste adgangen til din konto.
manage_your_passkeys_that_you_can_use_to: Administrér dine adgangsnøgler, som du kan bruge til at godkende dig selv.
create_a_one_time_login_code_to_sign_in_: Opret en engangskode for at logge ind fra en anden enhed uden en adgangsnøgle.
username_can_only_contain: Brugernavn må kun indeholde små bogstaver, tal, understregninger (_), punktummer (.), bindestreger (-) og @-tegn
sign_in_using_the_following_code_the_cod: Log ind med nedenstående kode. Koden udløber om 15 minutter.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_pas: Er du sikker på, at du vil slette denne adgangsnøgle?
name_your_passkey_to_easily_identify_it_: Giv din adgangsnøgle et navn, så du nemt kan genkende den senere.
add_a_new_api_key_for_programmatic_acces: Tilføj en ny API-nøgle til programmatisk adgang.
for_security_reasons_this_key_will_only_: Af sikkerhedshensyn vises denne nøgle kun én gang. Gem den et sikkert sted.
name_to_identify_this_api_key: Navn til at identificere denne API-nøgle.
optional_description_to_help_identify_th: Valgfri beskrivelse for at identificere nøglens formål.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_revoke_the_api_: Er du sikker på, at du vil tilbagekalde API-nøglen "{apiKeyName}"? Dette vil afbryde alle integrationer, der bruger nøglen.
configure_smtp_to_send_emails: Aktivér e-mailnotifikationer for at advare brugere, når et login registreres fra en ny enhed eller placering.
configure_ldap_settings_to_sync_users_an: Konfigurer LDAP-indstillinger for at synkronisere brugere og grupper fra en LDAP-server
you_have_to_save_the_changes_before_send: Du skal gemme ændringerne, før du kan sende en test-e-mail. Vil du gemme nu?
test_email_sent_successfully: Test-e-mail blev sendt til din e-mailadresse.
failed_to_send_test_email: Kunne ikke sende test-e-mail. Tjek serverloggen for flere oplysninger.
this_can_be_useful_for_selfsigned_certif: This can be useful for self-signed certificates.
send_an_email_to_the_user_when_they_log_: Send an email to the user when they log in from a new device.
emai_login_code_requested_by_user: Email Login Code Requested by User
allow_users_to_sign_in_with_a_login_code: Allows users to bypass passkeys by requesting a login code sent to their email. This significantly reduces security as anyone with access to the user's email can gain entry.
allows_an_admin_to_send_a_login_code_to_: Allows an admin to send a login code to the user via email.
the_duration_of_a_session_in_minutes_bef: The duration of a session in minutes before the user has to sign in again.
whether_the_users_should_be_able_to_edit: Whether the users should be able to edit their own account details.
whether_the_users_email_should_be_marked: Whether the user's email should be marked as verified for the OIDC clients.
the_search_filter_to_use_to_search_or_sy: The Search filter to use to search/sync users.
The Search filter to use to search/sync groups.
the_value_of_this_attribute_should_never: The value of this attribute should never change.
the_value_of_this_attribute_can_either_b: The value of this attribute can either be a URL, a binary or a base64 encoded image.
the_attribute_to_use_for_querying_member: The attribute to use for querying members of a group.
members_of_this_group_will_have_admin_pr: Members of this group will have Admin Privileges in Pocket ID.
admins_have_full_access_to_the_admin_pan: Admins have full access to the admin panel.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_use: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
manage_which_groups_this_user_belongs_to: Manage which groups this user belongs to.
custom_claims_are_key_value_pairs_that_c: Custom claims are key-value pairs that can be used to store additional information about a user. These claims will be included in the ID token if the scope 'profile' is requested.
create_a_new_group_that_can_be_assigned_: Create a new group that can be assigned to users.
name_that_will_be_displayed_in_the_ui: Name that will be displayed in the UI
name_that_will_be_in_the_groups_claim: Name that will be in the "groups" claim
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_use: Are you sure you want to delete this user group?
custom_claims_are_key_value_pairs_that_c: Custom claims are key-value pairs that can be used to store additional information about a user. These claims will be included in the ID token if the scope 'profile' is requested. Custom claims defined on the user will be prioritized if there are conflicts.
add_a_new_oidc_client_to_appname: Add a new OIDC client to {appName}.
use_this_link_to_sign_in_once: Use this link to sign in once. This is needed for users who haven't added a passkey yet or have lost it.
public_clients_description: Public clients do not have a client secret. They are designed for mobile, web, and native applications where secrets cannot be securely stored.
public_key_code_exchange_is_a_security_f: Public Key Code Exchange is a security feature to prevent CSRF and authorization code interception attacks.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_oid: Are you sure you want to delete this OIDC client?
are_you_sure_you_want_to_create_a_new_cl: Are you sure you want to create a new client secret? The old one will be invalidated.
add_user_groups_to_this_client_to_restri: Add user groups to this client to restrict access to users in these groups. If no user groups are selected, all users will have access to this client.
this_will_remove_the_uploaded_image_and_: This will remove the uploaded image and reset the profile picture to default. Do you want to continue?
profile_picture_has_been_reset: Profile picture has been reset. It may take a few minutes to update.
select_the_language_you_want_to_use: Select the language you want to use. Some languages may not be fully translated.
see_all_account_activities_from_the_last: See all user activity for the last 3 months.
turn_off_ui_animations: Turn off animations throughout the UI.
disabled_users_cannot_log_in_or_use_serv: Disabled users cannot log in or use services.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_disable_this_us: Are you sure you want to disable this user? They will not be able to log in or access any services.
ldap_soft_delete_users_description: When enabled, users removed from LDAP will be disabled rather than deleted from the system.
login_code_email_success: The login code has been sent to the user.
callback_url_description: URL(s) provided by your client. Will be automatically added if left blank. Wildcards (*) are supported, but best avoided for better security.
logout_callback_url_description: URL(s) provided by your client for logout. Wildcards (*) are supported, but best avoided for better security.
send_an_email_to_the_user_when_their_api: Send an email to the user when their API key is about to expire.
enter_code_displayed_in_previous_step: Enter the code that was displayed in the previous step.
federated_client_credentials_description: Using federated client credentials, you can authenticate OIDC clients using JWT tokens issued by third-party authorities.
preview_the_oidc_data_that_would_be_sent: Preview the OIDC data that would be sent for different users
Preview the OIDC data that would be sent for this user
select_an_accent_color_to_customize_the_: Select an accent color to customize the appearance of Pocket ID.
custom_accent_color_description: Indtast en brugerdefineret farve i et gyldigt CSS-format (f.eks. hex, rgb, hsl).
